attributes.action: stop placing children in prison and adult mental hospitals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is 2007. There should be no need for a petition. If you belong to the human race then you do not put children in prison or adult mental hospitals. They should be housed in alternate way. There is not a lot to say on this, we are either a barbaric people or we are not, which is it.
prison or an adult mental hospital is no place for a child. Has Charles Dickens taugt us nothing. It has already been decided that Britain is a sad place in which to bring up a child. When compared with the rest of Europe. We are either going to have compassion or we are not, which is it? If you do not agree with this petition, then there is no hope for the future. For the children are our future. They should not be a persecuted, disregarded section of society.
